findings.title: Inaccurate calculation of liquidity using event
findings.description: The amount excluding the fee from the withdrawal amount enters the parameter of the LiquidityRemoved event even though liquidity is removed by the amount of tokens to be withdrawn, causing inaccurate calculation.

findings.title: Unused parameter in CrossChainBridgeERC20#initialize() function
findings.description: Five contract addresses are received as parameters of the CrossChainBridgeERC20#initialize() function but have no place of use inside the function.

findings.title: WrappedNative function should be defined as view function
findings.description: It is advised to define the wrappedNative() function of the router as a view function.
